TopicTitle: Seriously can we just get a Quit Game button in the Esc menu?

Articles.Content: Why is it necessary to have to go through 3 menus and an 'Are you sure?' dialog to exit the game? Can we please just get a Quit Game button in the main Esc menu that asks 'Are you sure?'
If you're using Windows you can press Alt-F4 at any time to quit without saving or confirming. Not as elegant as a menu button but it seems to have no ill effects.

Alt-f4? Good to know till now I always alt-tab'ed and wrestled with the min-/maximising windows

On topic: yes please, it's anoying as hell

1)Alt+Tab

2)Task manager

3)Kill KSP

I agree, though. We need that button.

Endorsed; annoying as all hell.

Me too. (Gah, tencharlimit.)
Would take 30 seconds, would make 10 or more people happy. Do it.

Would take 30 seconds, would make 10 or more people happy. Do it.

Make that eleven!

Make that eleven!

Twelve chars

Yes, yes, yes.

Every game ever developed should have that option.

definitely yes. a nice clean, no frills, only get asked "are you sure" once thing would be great.

This reminds me of a program I wrote (seems like a thousand years ago) in which I had a bit of fun with the quit function. No matter how you exited it, you got sent through 37 layers of variations on "are you sure?" in which the program begged not to be shut down.

I know, I know. but it was like one of the first things I wrote when learning visual c++ 4.0.

seems I was the only one that thought it was hilarious.

Was thinking the same thing just the other day.

/support
I agree. It's especially useful if you have a slow desktop and it takes nearly 5 minutes to exit.
great idea, i like it civ-5 menu style where under the esc menu theres options to quit to main menu as well as to quit to desktop.

This may be one of the few suggestions that everyone just agrees with and does not descend into a discussion about finer points of stuff.

I`ve been playing some other games lately and I really appreciate a `quit to desktop` button on every menu you can reach by pressing escape.

One more post in support here.
